column1: Asthma: Ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that you had asthma?
Alcohol: Binge drinkers (males having five plus, females having four plus drinks at one time).
Cardiovascular: Has a doctor ever told you that you had a heart attack (myocardial infarction)?
Cholesterol: Been told by a doctor-health professional that your blood cholesterol is high?
Diabetes: Ever told by a doctor that you have diabetes? exclude: diabetes at pregnancy.
Health Care Access: Have any kind of health insurance coverage?
Physical Activity: Had no leisure-time physical activity.
Overweight & Obese: Based on Body Mass Index (BMI).
Fruits & Vegetables: Did not consume at least 5 servings per day.
